Seattle, which had five players score in double figures, had its six-game home winning streak snapped." Tonight( Allen Iverson ) was pretty consistent throughout the game knocking down shots," said Sonics coach Nate McMillan . Every time we tried to make a run it seemed like he came up with a big basket. When he has that going, there is nothing you can do except hope that he misses some shots. Keith Van Horn scored 26, Derrick Coleman had 14 points and 14 rebounds and Eric Snow also had a double-double with 14 points and 10 assists. It was Allen Iverson 's third game this season with 40 or more points and the fourth

at Mr. Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq." Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody," Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.[ CIA Director President Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld -- who does reveal that former President Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11-- argues that removing Saddam Hussein was the right thing to do. weary of all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinized companies." I don't think Eric Schmidt was pushed. I think he jumped," said Ken Auletta , author of Googled: The End of the World As We Know It. " I think Eric Schmidt is burned out." take over day-to-day operations, the company said, and Eric Schmidt will focus on partnerships and government outreach. Eric Schmidt , who has headed up Google since July 2001, sent a message via Twitter Thursday saying: Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on new products and projects. In February, Google acquired Clifton Park, N.Y.-based video-compression company for about$ 124.6 million. X Factor USA, but insisted that he is confident it was the right decision. On whether he was` nervous' to be offering such a huge sum of cash, Simon Cowell admitted: I think we should be nervous. The reason we decided to do this was to show the people who are auditioning for the show is that sometimes you have to put your money where your mouth is. By putting up that kind of prize money it's a massive, massive risk but it's also an incredible incentive. Preston Gralla hebben nerds aan de macht geen zin." Steve Ballmer kan de meest briljante ontwikkelaars onder hem hebben, maar het draait om een visie voor de toekomst." Dean Takahasi van Venturebeat stelt het nog scherper: Op een gegeven moment kan Steve Ballmer niet meer de schuld op mensen binnen de organisatie schuiven en moet hij zelf de verantwoordelijkheid nemen. Dat hebben we eerder gezien bij Nokia en AMD. De kans lijkt klein dat met het aanstellen van nieuwe topmanagers de aandeelhouders direct tevreden gesteld worden." Het kan wel de druk op Steve Ballmer wegnemen, maar alleen als het op korte termijn resultaat oplevert"

Chrysler's market share rose to 9.2 per cent from 8.8 per cent." We have slowly recovered from the low volumes of 2009, up 15 per cent," Sergio Marchionne said, pointing to the significant performance in Canada. Our market share in Canada has been exceptionally good. Chrysler's global sales last year topped 1.5 million cars and trucks, buoyed by a raft of new models.
